description: This file defines a custom exception class named SimpleBankingGlobalException used for global exception handling in a banking application. It includes Lombok annotations for boilerplate code reduction and extends RuntimeException.

classes.name: SimpleBankingGlobalException
classes.description: A custom runtime exception class for handling global errors in the banking application.

methods.name: SimpleBankingGlobalException(String message)
methods.description: Constructor that initializes the exception with a message.
